thing-type.label: ZEN21 Paddle Switch
thing-type.description: Paddle Switch<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtZ-WAVE ON/OFF SWITCH</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtBring your Z-Wave gateway hub or controller as close to the switch as possible</li&gt <li&gtPut your Z-Wave controller into inclusion mode</li&gt <li&gtTap the upper paddle of the switch 3 times very quickly to finalize the inclusion process</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtBring your Z-Wave gateway hub or controller as close to the switch as possible</li&gt <li&gtPut your Z-Wave controller into exclusion mode</li&gt <li&gtTap the lower paddle of the switch 3 times very quickly to finalize the exclusion process</li&gt </ol&gt

parameter.description: This device will send SWITCH BINARY REPORT to Group 1 when operated manually.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtDepending on your Z-Wave gateway's home automation software capabilities, you may be able to associate your Z-Wave switch in groups with other Z-Wave devices to schedule scenes and create events. This on off switch supports Group 1 with up to five devices for lifeline communication. This device will send SWITCH BINARY REPORT to Group 1 when operated manually. Please refer to your controller's user guide for advanced programming instructions as they are a little different for every software.</p&gt
